summary: By accident, Buster and an intimidating woman end up married.
cast: Buster Keaton|Wallace Beery|Monte Collins|Wheezer Dell|Harry Madison|Kate Price|Joe Roberts|Tom Wilson
director: Directors: Edward F. Cline (as Eddie Cline), Buster Keaton (as 'Buster' Keaton)
title: Las relaciones con mi mujer
